fields.name: Drive Forwards U.W
fields.description: Drive forwards until a front obstacle is detected.

fields.name: Drive Backwards U.W
fields.description: Drive forwards until a rear obstacle is detected.

fields.name: Manual Drive
fields.description: Enable manual driving mode until instructed by the remote operator to continue with the mission.

fields.name: 30 Second Stationary Pause
fields.description: Remain stationary with all sub-systems operating in idle, until a 30 second time period has expired.

fields.name: 360 Degree Spin
fields.description: Rotate on the spot for a full 360 degree turn.

fields.name: Wait for user input
fields.description: Remain stationary, with all subsystems idling until a user input is detected from any human interface.

fields.name: LIDAR Reading
fields.description: Take a 360 degree LIDAR reading and store to database.
